title: How to Add a Speech Bubble on the Photo with Speechable.Com

steps.headline: Click on icon "from your PC" to upload a photo, it will  take you to your computer
steps.description: Find a photo and highlight it  (see image) Click on Open button, it will load your photo up
Click on "Bubble" button It will open a "Bubble Property" box  with the tools

steps.headline: Using the  property box you can
steps.description: Change  bubble's background color, Change bubble's shape, Change bubble's text size and  look, Add a border and change its color..

steps.headline: On the bubble itself  use your LEFT mouse button to manipulate the little green dots to -
steps.description: Increase/decrease a bubble's size Move a bubble closer to mouth Make a connection line longer or shorter Make a connection line straight  or  curvy,  You have to play with it.

steps.headline:

steps.description: If you prefer to keep this photo  private click on the little 'eye' icon underneath the photo  otherwise it will be saved to the site's  public Gallery.

steps.headline: Click  on photo with the RIGHT mouse button to get a  drop-down menu.
steps.description:
Now  you have  options:
Save As  to actually  save it on your computer, or
E-mail the photo.

steps.headline: End of process.
steps.description: Explore adding  bubble speech to your other photos using this guide.

text:
Open up Speechable.com. Click on icon "from your PC" to upload a photo, it will take you to your computer Find a photo and highlight it (see image) Click on Open button, it will load your photo up {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/1/1c/Bubble-icon.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/1/1c/Bubble-icon.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":159,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":263.24022346368713,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Click on "Bubble" button It will open a "Bubble Property" box with the tools Using the property box you can Change bubble's background color, Change bubble's shape, Change bubble's text size and look, Add a border and change its color.. On the bubble itself use your LEFT mouse button to manipulate the little green dots to - Increase/decrease a bubble's size Move a bubble closer to mouth Make a connection line longer or shorter Make a connection line straight or curvy, You have to play with it. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/4b/Eye-icon.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/4b/Eye-icon.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":368,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":608,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"}When you are done Click on "Save" button ... If you prefer to keep this photo private click on the little 'eye' icon underneath the photo otherwise it will be saved to the site's public Gallery. Click on photo with the RIGHT mouse button to get a drop-down menu. Now you have options: Save As to actually save it on your computer, or E-mail the photo. End of process. Explore adding bubble speech to your other photos using this guide.
